column1: 27241,X-Factor (2005) #45,45,31097,70,"What is ""Cortex""? The word keeps coming up in Madrox's serial killer investigation. Now he confronts the one individual who may hold the answers: None other than Victor Von Doom-but it's Doctor Doom as you've never seen him before. The shocks never stop and the surprises never let up! /Rated T  ...$2.99",
